actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1009.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land located in the Fairbanks Recording District, State of Alaska, to the Fairbanks North Star Borough.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a specified tract of land located in the Fairbanks Recording District, Alaska, to the Fairbanks North Star Borough.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land located in the Fairbanks Recording District, State of Alaska, to the Fairbanks North Star Borough.
